type.description: VLAN type, such as common VLANs, super-VLANs, and sub-VLANs.

mac-learning.description: Whether MAC address leaning is enabled in a VLAN.

statistic-enable.description: Whether VLAN statistics collection is enabled.

statistic-discard.description: Whether BUM discard statistics collection is enabled.

mac-aging-time.description: MAC address aging time, 0 indicates that MAC addresses do not age.

super-vlan.description: The corresponding super-VLAN ID when the VLAN is a sub-VLAN.

mac-learning-enable.description: Enable unknown unicast MAC address learning.

member-ports.description: List of ports in a VLAN.

member-port.description: Statistics of port in a VLAN.

interface-name.description: Names of ports in a VLAN.
